title: Did 22 Clinton Foundation employees get arrested on the first day of the federal investigation?
subtitle: The websites of the unreliable parties have republished an act of irony by reporting that the investigation conducted by the Federal Bureau of Investigation of the Clinton Foundation resulted in the criminal arrest of 22 persons.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The Federal Bureau of Investigation arrested 22 employees of the Clinton Foundation on the first day of the investigation into alleged illegal activities.
